title: DeRozan's Game-Winners, Bulls Potential, Kyrie Returning
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Kirk Goldsberry and Jamal Collier to discuss DeMar DeRozan's historic game-winners on back-to-back nights, the Bulls potential this season, the significance of Kyrie returning, if the Nets can overtake the Bucks and potential trade targets for the Bulls to get into the NBA Finals conversation.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Historic Game-Winners For DeRozan, Bulls' Potential, Significance Of Kyrie
